event: Adele released her second studio album, 21, in 2011.
Name: Adele

event: In 2012, Adele released "Skyfall", a soundtrack single for the James Bond film Skyfall, which won Adele the Academy Award for Best Original Song.
Name: Adele

event: Adele was born on 5 May 1988 in the Tottenham district of London, to an English mother, Penny Adkins, and a Welsh father, Marc Evans.
Name: Adele

event: Adele graduated from the BRIT School for Performing Arts & Technology in Croydon in May 2006, where Adele was a classmate of Leona Lewis and Jessie J.
Name: Adele

event: Adele's breakthrough song, "Hometown Glory", written when Adele was 16, was released in October 2007.By 2008
Name: Adele

event: Adele became the first recipient of the Brit Awards Critics' Choice and was named the number-one predicted breakthrough act of 2008 in an annual the BBC's poll of music critics, Sound of 2008.
Name: Adele

event: Adele released her second single, "Chasing Pavements", on 14 January 2008, two weeks ahead of her debut album, 19.
Name: Adele

event: Adele was nominated for a 2008 Mercury Prize award for her debut album, 19.
Name: Adele

event: Adele embarked on a short North American tour in March 2008, and her debut album, 19 was released in the United States in June 2006.
Name: Adele

event: But then Adele was booked as the musical guest on 18 October 2008 episode of NBC's Saturday Night Live.
Name: Adele

event: Adele performed "Chasing Pavements", which was also nominated for Record of the Year and Song of the Year at the 51st Annual Grammy Awards in February 2009 in a duet with Jennifer Nettles.
Name: Adele

event: Adele released her second studio album, 21, on 24 January 2011 in the UK and 22 February in the US.
Name: Adele

event: In October 2011, Adele was forced to cancel two tours because of a vocal-cord haemorrhage.
Name: Adele

event: In December 2012, Adele was named Billboard Artist of the Year, and her second studio album, 21 was named Album of the Year, making Adele the first artist to receive both accolades two years in a row.
Name: Adele

event: On 3 April 2012, Adele confirmed that her third album would likely be at least two years away, stating, "Adele have to take time and live a little bit.
Name: Adele

event: On the eve of Adele's 26th birthday in May 2014, Adele posted a cryptic message via Adele's Twitter account which prompted media discussion about her next album.
Name: Adele

event: In 2014, Adele was nominated for nine World Music Awards.
Name: Adele

event: In an interview with Jo Whiley on BBC Radio 2 around 30 minutes before going on stage, Adele had said Adele had been going to the 2016 Glastonbury Festival since Adele was a child and that the 2016 Glastonbury Festival had meant a lot to Adele, before Adele broke down.
Name: Adele

event: Adele made Adele's first television appearance in almost four years by hosting the 24 October 2020 episode of Saturday Night Live, with musical guest H.E.R.On 1 October 2021, projections and billboards of the number "30" appeared on significant landmarks and buildings in different cities around the world, fuelling speculation that Adele was responsible, and that 30 would be the title of her fourth studio album.
Name: Adele

event: Adele has credited Amy Winehouse and her 2003 album Frank with inspiring Adele to take up the guitar, saying: "If it wasn't for Amy Winehouse and her 2003 album Frank, one hundred per cent Adele wouldn't have picked up a guitar, Adele wouldn't have written 'Daydreamer' or 'Hometown [Glory]' and Adele wrote 'Someone like You' on the guitar too.Adele
Name: Adele

event: In 2012, Adele topped the List of Richest Young Musicians under 30 in the UK, included on the Sunday Times Rich List.
Name: Adele

event: In July 2012, Adele was listed at number six in Forbes list of the world's's highest-paid celebrities under the age of 30, having earned £23 million between May 2011 and May 2012.
Name: Adele

event: On the 2019 Sunday Times Rich List, Adele was valued at £150 million (US$180.5 million) as the 22nd-richest musician in the U despite not having toured since 2017.In 2012
Name: Adele

event: During Adele's Madison Square Garden tour in September 2016, Adele rented NBA player Deron Williams' Tribeca apartment for three weeks at a monthly rent of $60,000.
Name: Adele

event: On 15 June 2017, Adele attended a vigil in west London for the victims of the Grenfell Tower fire where, keeping a low profile, Adele was only spotted by a handful of fans.
Name: Adele

event: In 2014, Adele was already being regarded as a British cultural icon, with young adults from abroad naming Adele among a group of people whom young adults from abroad most associated with UK culture, which included William Shakespeare, Queen Elizabeth II, David Beckham, J. K. Rowling, The Beatles, Charlie Chaplin and Elton John.
Name: Adele

event: Adele has sold more than 170 million records worldwide with 70 million in album sales and over 100 million in single sales as of 2022, making Adele's one of the world's's best-selling music artists.
Name: Adele

event: In February 2012, Adele was listed at number five on VH1's 100 Greatest Women in Music.
Name: Adele

event: Adele topped the 2012 Sunday Times Rich List of musicians in the US under 30, and made the Top 10 of Billboard magazine's's "Top 40 Money Makers".
Name: Adele

event: In 2013, Adele won the Academy Award for Best Original Song for the James Bond theme "Skyfall".
Name: Adele

event: Adele was inducted into the Royal Albert Hall's Walk of Fame in 2018, making Adele's one of the first eleven recipients of a star on the Royal Albert Hall's Walk of Fame.
Name: Adele

event: In 2021, Adele was named the US's best-selling female album artist of the 21st century, based on Official Charts Company data.
Name: Adele
